item.description:
Sorry guys but the trivia was canceled last minute and they have a band coming called Joe Wyatt & Ferris AKA "The Gunslingers" which is an acoustic folk music sound from what I was told. There is no cover charge.




Come start off your long Thanksgiving weekend with Boston Atheists at Alchemist for dinner and Jeopardy trivia hosted by Alexi Tribeca! Dinner is at 8:30 and trivia starts at 10pm.

You can find information on parking, menu, and lots more at http://alchemistloung... and can find out even more information and photos about trivia on their myspace page.


If there are no spaces left then just add yourself to the waiting list and I will add you on!
--------------

P.S. If you would like to, please bring in canned goods to any event this November to give to Zachary or Nora. At the end of the month we will be donating these goods to the Greater Boston Food Bank on behlaf of the Boston Atheists.
item.how_to_find_us: I have made a reservation under Jennifer with Boston Atheists.
item.name: Dinner and Jeopardy Trivia at Alchemist!
